article.title: SimAuthor to Provide Continued Analytical Support to Navy Military Flight Operations Quality Assurance Program
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: SimAuthor, a wholly owned subsidiary of QinetiQ North America, has been awarded a four-year, $5 million contract from the Commander Naval Air Forces (CNAF) to continue support of CNAF's Military Flight Operations Quality Assurance (MFOQA) Bridge program with its flight data analysis, visualization software and MFOQA subject matter expert team.
